Package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure

Class AllureDbClientManager

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager
io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure.AllureDbClientManager
@Component public class AllureDbClientManager extends io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager
Specialized DbClientManager implementation for Allure reporting.

This class extends DbClientManager and overrides the client initialization to integrate with Allure, enabling enhanced logging and reporting for database interactions.

  • Method Details

    • initializeDbClient

      protected io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClient initializeDbClient(io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig)
      Initializes an Allure-enhanced database client.

      This method overrides the default client initialization to provide enhanced request and response logging using Allure reports.

      Overrides:
      initializeDbClient in class io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager
      Parameters:
      dbConfig - The configuration used to initialize the client.
      Returns:
      A DbClient instance enhanced with Allure logging.
